So many resources

31/01/2016

There are so many resources available online to those interested in learning programming. Over the last couple of weeks, I've been going over the courses at Codecademy to refresh myself in the areas of HTML, CSS and Javascript. Whilst I haven't learnt anything new and groundbreaking, it's nice to go over these areas again.

Some of the other resources I've been recommended:

freeCodeCamp

Learn Ruby The Hard Way

RubyKoans

Ruby on Rails Tutorial

Stackoverflow

/r/learnprogramming
